container_info.post_install_tip: Follow the 2-step setup process to connect your sheet to Voice Metrics.   Then select any cell that you wish to Voice Enable and click the "Add" button in the Voice Metrics side menu.  Once added, you will always be able to ask for the current value!

name: Voice Metrics
description: The Voice Metrics Add On allows you to HEAR your Sheets data with your voice assistant (Alexa, etc.).  JUST ASK for your data!
